snippet: There have been 10 blocked punts in the N.F.L., one more than in all of last season, and the Jets’ special teams coach, Mike Westhoff, says he has a good idea why.
abstract: NFL Fast Forward; current football season has been marked by an unusual number of blocked punts--10 in past six weeks; New York Jets special teams coach Mike Westshoff attributes phenomenon to an influx of rookies.
lead_paragraph: There have been 10 blocked punts in the N.F.L., one more than in all of last season, and the Jets’ special teams coach, Mike Westhoff, says he has a good idea why.

headline.seo: Block That Punt? Special Teams Are Listening
headline.main: For Rise of Blocked Punts, Go Back to Off-Season
headline.print_headline:
For Rise of Blocked Punts,
Go Back to Off-Season
